scripts.export: node auto-build-wallpaper-dir-info.js && next build && next export && mv out/_next out/next && sed -i '' -e 's/\/_next/\.\/next/g' out/**.html && sed -i '' -e 's/\/_next/\/next/g' out/next/static/chunks/**.js &&  mv out/index.html ../extension && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ ../extension/next/ && rm -rf out && rsync -va --delete-after public/images ../extension/ && 7z a ../inspop-extension-release.zip ../extension/* && node auto-build-wallpaper-dir-info.js && next build && next export
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m 'update' && git push
